mapper.select: SELECT fu.facility_code AS facilityCode, f.facility_name AS facilityName, COUNT(*) AS usageCount FROM facility_usage fu JOIN facility f ON fu.facility_code = f.facility_code WHERE DATE(fu.usage_at) = #{date} AND f.hotel_group_code = #{hotelGroupCode} GROUP BY fu.facility_code, f.facility_name ORDER BY usageCount DESC
